name: School of Computer Science & Engineering
description: Premier school offering cutting-edge programs in Computer Science, Information Technology, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Cyber Security, and Software Development. Equipped with advanced computer labs, GTH Innovation Hub, and strong industry partnerships.
facilities: Advanced Computer Labs with latest hardware and software
industry_collaborations: Partnerships with leading IT companies for placements, internships, and training programs. Regular workshops and hackathons conducted.

name: School of Commerce & Business Management
description: Comprehensive business education with programs in Business Administration, Commerce, Finance, Marketing, HR, and International Business. Offers 17+ MBA specializations with focus on industry exposure through live projects, internships, and corporate interactions.
key_features: Case study methodology, industry visits, guest lectures from corporate leaders, summer internships, live projects, and placement assistance with 350+ recruiters.

name: Geeta Institute of Pharmacy
description: PCI-approved institute offering comprehensive pharmaceutical education from diploma to doctoral level. State-of-the-art laboratories for pharmaceutics, pharmacology, pharmaceutical chemistry, and quality control with emphasis on research and practical training.
industry_exposure: Regular industrial visits to pharmaceutical manufacturing units, hospitals, and quality control labs. Internships in leading pharma companies and hospitals. Strong placement record in pharmaceutical sector.

name: School of Forensic Sciences
description: Specialized school offering scientific training in forensic investigation, criminology, evidence analysis, and criminal justice. Advanced laboratories equipped for forensic biology, chemistry, digital forensics, and crime scene investigation with practical case study approach.
unique_features: Practical training in evidence collection and analysis. Guest lectures from law enforcement officials. Tie-ups with forensic laboratories and police departments for hands-on exposure. Moot court sessions on expert witness testimony.

name: School of Agricultural Studies
description: Modern agriculture education focusing on sustainable farming, agronomy, crop production, and agricultural technology. Extensive field area for practical training in various crops, soil management, and modern agricultural techniques with emphasis on rural development.
industry_linkages: Collaborations with agricultural research institutes, seed companies, and government agricultural departments. Regular field visits to progressive farms and agro-industries.

name: School of Health & Allied Sciences
description: Dedicated school for allied health professions including Nutrition, Dietetics, and Physiotherapy. Clinical training facilities, therapeutic equipment, and hospital partnerships for practical exposure. Focus on patient care, rehabilitation, and wellness promotion.
clinical_exposure: 6-month mandatory internships in hospitals, rehabilitation centers, and wellness clinics. Regular health camps and community nutrition programs. Tie-ups with leading hospitals for clinical rotations.

name: School of Hospitality & Hotel Management
description: Professional hospitality education with state-of-the-art training facilities for food production, service, housekeeping, and hotel operations. Industry-standard kitchen, mock hotel setup, and mandatory industrial training in star-rated hotels and restaurants.
facilities: Front Office Lab with PMS Software
industry_training: 6-month industrial training in 5-star hotels, restaurants, and resorts. Regular industrial visits to hospitality establishments. Guest lectures from hotel industry professionals. Placement support in leading hotel chains.

name: Geeta Global Law School
description: BCI-approved law school offering integrated and traditional law programs. Moot court facilities, legal aid clinic, and practical training through internships in courts, law firms, and corporate legal departments. Focus on litigation skills, legal research, and professional ethics.
facilities: Moot Court Hall with courtroom setup
Law Library with extensive legal database
Access to online legal research databases
practical_training: Regular moot court competitions. Mandatory internships in district courts, high courts, law firms, and corporate legal departments. Legal aid camps for community service. Guest lectures from judges, senior advocates, and legal experts.

name: School of Humanities & Social Sciences
description: Diverse programs in liberal arts, social sciences, and humanities. Emphasis on critical thinking, research skills, and holistic development. Preparation for civil services, teaching, research, media, and social work with focus on contemporary social issues.
unique_features: Civil services coaching and guidance. Counseling and career guidance services. Regular seminars on contemporary issues. Fieldwork and community engagement projects. Guest lectures from academicians, civil servants, and social activists.

name: School of Engineering
description: Core engineering programs in Mechanical, Civil, Electrical, and Electronics & Communication with modern laboratories and workshops. Focus on practical skills, design thinking, and industry 4.0 technologies. Strong placement support with technical training programs.
industry_exposure: Regular industrial visits to manufacturing plants, construction sites, and power stations. Industrial training in reputed engineering companies. Participation in technical fests and YUGANTRAN. Projects with industry collaboration.
